channel.title: Ios on Fabrice Aneche
channel.description: Recent content in Ios on Fabrice Aneche

item.title: My developer tools (Mobile)
item.description: As a day to day Python and iOS developer, I’m using a lot of tools on my Mac, here is a list that could help you too. Textmate 2, Free, it’s funny to see that most people don’t know Textmate 2 is open source and totally free, this is a wonderful editor with completion and support for most languages. SublimeText 2, free/pay, I’ve switched to Sublime mostly for the Golang support with Gosublime and not regreting it.
